name: 欧内斯特·劳伦斯
bio_short: 美国物理学家，因发明“回旋加速器”(Cyclotron) 而获得了1939年的诺贝尔物理学奖。他是“大科学”(Big Science) 的先驱，其发明的加速器开创了高能物理学，并在曼哈顿计划中用于分离铀。
bio_short_en: An American physicist who won the 1939 Nobel Prize for his invention of the 'Cyclotron'. He was a pioneer of 'Big Science', and his accelerator founded high-energy physics and was used in the Manhattan Project to separate uranium.
